items.Item1: Doomed Dragon Amulet Scythe of Elementals
items.strItemName: Doomed Dragon Amulet Scythe of Elementals
items.strItemDescription: Eight elemental orbs to celebrate DragonFable's anniversary! Visit the Black Market Moglin to upgrade this weapon. This item requires a Dragon Amulet to use.

items.Item1: Ancient Dragon Amulet Scythe of the Elements
items.strItemName: Ancient Dragon Amulet Scythe of the Elements
items.strItemDescription: Forged by the Avatars in ages long past. Now available for DragonFable's anniversary! Allows element selection. Visit the Black Market Moglin to upgrade this weapon. This item requires a Dragon Amulet to use.

items.Item1: Ultimate Dragon Amulet Scythe of Elementals
items.strItemName: Ultimate Dragon Amulet Scythe of Elementals
items.strItemDescription: Seven elemental choices for seven years of DragonFable! Thank you for helping support DF during our birthday month in 2013!
